Defence Services Command and Staff College

The college is charged with the responsibility of training senior defence and security personnel in various fields.

Functions

  • To train selected officers as grade ii staff officers for assumption of increasing responsibilities in command and staff appointments for the Zambia Defence Forces and the SADC region.
  • Mandate to train officers of the Zambia Defence Force to enhance capacity building in military operations.
